A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a mess\, many of the new characters decisions and motives make little sense\, the immersion of the universe is distorted for plot convenience and the classical tyrannical archetype portrayed through the imperial forces are reduced to a joke. The one positive the  movie had was the chemistry between Kylo ren and Rei\, and their team up but that\, one decent move in a new and interesting direction was quickly wasted. Starwars is dead.
